outline:
1. what, whatever
    1. what?
    2. whatever, what, whatsoever
    3. how?, why?, wherefore? (with prefixes)
kjv_def: how great (mighty), that which, what(-soever), why.
strongs_def: {properly, interrogative what? (including how? why? when?); but also exclamation, what! (including how!), or indefinitely what}
